channel.title: CoffeeUpdate on Jason's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CoffeeUpdate on Jason's Blog

item.title: My Delayed 2022 Single Origin List
item.description: This year I’ve wanted to build my palate so I can identify differences across single origin coffees. So here’s my list so far: Colombia Brazil (Dry Process) Guatemala Huehuetenago / Antigua Burundi Ethiopia (Washed, Natural) Sumatra Peru India Bali Honduras I pulled this list from some combination of Sweet Maria’s (a site that ships unroasted coffee) most popular list and the most common origins I’ve seen on coffee roaster websites.
